title: $:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline
name: list-inline
description: Render a selection of tiddlers as an inline list
author: Ben Webber
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/README":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/README","text":"''list-inline'' adds a macro to render a selection of tiddlers as an inline list or series.

{{$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/macros/public}}
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/macros/public":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/macros/public","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define list-inline(filter join:", " last:" and " joinLast:"yes")
<$let
  filter="""$filter$"""
  count={{{[all[tiddlers]subfilter<filter>count[]]}}}
  join={{{[<count>compare:number:gt[2]then["""$join$"""]]}}}
  joinLast={{{[title[$joinLast$]match:caseinsensitive[yes]then<join>]}}}
>
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers]subfilter<filter>first[]]"><$link><<currentTiddler>></$link></$list><$list filter="[all[tiddlers]subfilter<filter>butfirst[]butlast[]]"><<join>><$link><<currentTiddler>></$link></$list><$list filter="[all[tiddlers]subfilter<filter>butfirst[]last[]]"><<joinLast>>$last$<$link><<currentTiddler>></$link></$list>
</$let>
\end

!! `list-inline`

Render a selection of tiddlers as an inline list or series.

!!! Parameters

;filter
: A [ext[filter|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Filters]] selecting the tiddlers to list.

;join
: A string separator joining items in the list when the list has three (3) or more items. The default is `, `.

;last
: A string rendered before the last item in the list. The default is ` and `.

;joinLast
: Whether to render `join` before `last` in a list with three (3) or more items. In other words, render a [ext[serial comma|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serial_comma]]. Can be `yes` or `no`. The default is `yes`.
"}}}
